Pre-Game Insights: Latvia are aiming for revenge after a heavy loss to Armenia and need a win to avoid further struggles in the Nations League.
The Faroe Islands came into the match as underdogs, having only recently lost to Latvia in the Baltic Cup.

Others: Latvia's team news includes potential changes due to injuries and suspensions.
